response.overview: Cov’Vroom, is a final year student short film realised by a group of student in a french university. It’s the story of a man, Hugo who take a carpool, to go to a wedding, but he met George, the driver. That man, is strange and he take another road contrary the formal one, at that point of rendezvous, where george join his daughter, he lets Hugo take a walk, but Hugo found a dead body, with near it, some strange bloody things. Also Hugo run, to escape of that strange situation. George and run after Hugo to catch him and we suppose to kill him.
response.title: Co’Vroom
